intro: Lightfootia exilis, commonly known as the slender lightfoot or slender balsam, is a herbaceous plant native to the tropical regions of South America. Its small size and ornamental flowers make it a popular choice for greenhouse cultivation. Lightfootia exilis is also valued for its medicinal properties, with some traditional uses reported in South American herbal remedies.
